sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3180 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI , CTRB_NCNT , CTRB_TGAM , CTJA_CHAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(CTRB_SEQN)+1,1) FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #ctrbDdcd# , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #ctrbDdcd#, '11')) , #ctrbCont# , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbName# , #ctrbBsnu# , #ctrbAmnt# , #crtbCncd# , #crnrFlag# , #cbtgName# , #rsnoNumb# , #ctrbCtnt# , #receRati# , #ctrbNcnt# , (nvl(#ctrbAmnt#,0) - nvl(#ctjaCham#,0)) , #ctjaCham# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3180 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn# , CTRB_DDCD=#ctrbDdcd# , CTRB_TYCD=(fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #ctrbDdcd#, '11')) , CTRB_CONT=#ctrbCont# , CTRB_YRMN=#ctrbYrmn# , CTRB_NAME=#ctrbName# , CTRB_BSNU=#ctrbBsnu# , CTRB_AMNT=#ctrbAmnt# , CRTB_CNCD=#crtbCncd# , CRNR_FLAG=#crnrFlag# , CBTG_NAME=#cbtgName# , RSNO_NUMB=#rsnoNumb# , CTRB_CTNT=#ctrbCtnt# , RECE_RATI=#receRati# , CTRB_NCNT = #ctrbNcnt# , CTRB_TGAM = (nvl(#ctrbAmnt#,0) - nvl(#ctjaCham#,0)) , CTJA_CHAM = #ctjaCham# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SETT_GBCD AS settGbcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS settGbcdcommCdNm , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CTRB_DDCD) AS CTRB_DDNM , CTRB_DDCD AS ctrbDdcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CTRB_DDCD) AS ctrbDdcdcommCdNm , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRTB_CNCD AS crtbCncdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CRTB_CNCD) AS crtbCncdcommCdNm , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI ,CTRB_NCNT ,CTRB_TGAM ,CTJA_CHAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3180 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3180 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI ,CTRB_NCNT ,CTRB_TGAM ,CTJA_CHAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3180 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_CONT , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_NAME , CTRB_BSNU , CTRB_AMNT , CRTB_CNCD , CRNR_FLAG , CBTG_NAME , RSNO_NUMB , CTRB_CTNT , RECE_RATI ,CTRB_NCNT ,CTRB_TGAM ,CTJA_CHAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3180 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3180 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
